title: College Park Scholars: Science, Discovery & the Universe First-Year Colloquium A
description:
Restriction: Students must be enrolled in the College Park Scholars Science, Discovery & the Universe (CPSD) program.
Additional information: Both freshman colloquia (CPSD 100 and 101) are required for students to earn their College Park Scholars citations; however, they can be taken in any order during a student's first year.
department: College Park Scholars-Science, Discovery & the Universe
